name: Blind Spot (enfrnz | Masked Studio)
description:
This is a university project made to show the blind spot present in one's eye. 

If you need it for your college project or just for casual needs, you can download it and test it out! If used in projects or presentations, credit is necessary. But the main aim for our mini game here is, for people to learn about the Blind spot and get a better understanding of what it is for its own use. 

Thanks for viewing!
